revision.text:
<!--공원_정보-->
{{TemplateMapping
| mapToClass = Park
| mappings =
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 이름 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 유형 | ontologyProperty = type }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 위치 | ontologyProperty = location }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 면적 | ontologyProperty = areaTotal | unit = squareKilometre }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 개원일 | ontologyProperty = openingDate }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 웹사이트 | ontologyProperty = foaf:homepage }}
end}}
